attributes.additional_details:
Start a Bucks Pothole Lottery or Sponsor a Road scheme.

Sponsor a Road scheme would work a bit like the Dog's Trust Sponsor a Dog; in as much as all sponsors would receive a sticker, fridge magnet and certificate featuring their chosen road and their name and hand print could be embedded in the road. They would obviously be responsible for the filling in of potholes which would be reported to their home address as and when they occurred.

rejection.details: Is this e-petition aimed only at those in a particular area (and should therefore be addressed to Bucks CC)?  If it is intended to attract attention at a national level, then it should state clearly what action it is asking central Government to take.
